Uses of Class
card.Hand

Packages that use Hand
Package
Description
card
Provides all the objects that interact directly with a card and the card class itself.
casino
Provides all the objects that are directly and can be (more or less) tangible things that are inside a casino, that being the player and a round of the poker game that is being played
variants
Provides the game variants of video poker, along side with a HandEvalutor that can analyse the different type of hands (complete or incomplete) Package open for extension
